name: Dead or Alive
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may give an enemy hero in radius the ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
A hero with the Bounty marker spends 1 additional ::life_counters:: life counter when defeated.

name: Side Quest
text:
If you are adjacent to an enemy unit, give a hero in radius a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
A hero with the Bounty marker spends 1 additional ::life_counters:: life counter when defeated.

name: Get over here!
text: Target a unit or a token in range and in a straight line, with no obstacles between you and the target. Move that target towards you in a straight line, until you are adjacent.

name: A Complicated Profession
text: After you give a hero the ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, that hero discards a card.

name: A Game of Chance
text:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise you gain 1 coin.
_(You can only guess colors that could be in that player's hand.)_

name: Light Crossbow
text: Target a unit in range and in a straight line with no other units or terrain between you.

name: Close Call
text:
If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, block the attack and that hero gives the marker to you.
_(The marker's effect is applied to you.)_

name: Dead Man's Hand
text:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise you gain 2 coins.

name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Target a unit in range and in a straight line with no units or terrain between you.

name: Narrow Escape
text: If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, block the attack and retrieve the marker.

name: Drinking Buddies
text: You may have a hero in radius retrieve a discarded card. If they do, you may also retrieve a discarded card.

name: Hand Crossbow
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero in range with a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: Vantage Point
text: Ignore obstacles. If a hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, +1 ::movement_green:: movement.

name: We're Not Done Yet!
text:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise may repeat once or gain 2 coins.

name: Arbalest
text: Target a unit in range and in a straight line with no units or terrain between you.

name: Perfect Getaway
text: If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, block the attack.

name: Another One!
text:
You may have a hero in radius retrieve a discarded card. If they do, you may also retrieve a discarded card.
**End of turn:** May repeat once.

name: Hunter-Seeker
text:
**Choose one, or both,** on different targets —
- Target a hero in range with a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: High Ground
text: Ignore obstacles. If a hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, +2 ::movement_green:: movement.
